thread.title: Parenting New Hampshire Magazine Names Water Country "Family Favorite" Award Recipient
thread.title_full: Parenting New Hampshire Magazine Names Water Country "Family Favorite" Award Recipient - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Parenting New Hampshire Magazine Names Water Country "Family Favorite" Award Recipient
text:
Water Country has been selected by the readers of Parenting New Hampshire as a “Family Favorite” award recipient for Family Favorite Water Park!
Portsmouth, NH (PRWEB) September 30, 2015
For the fifth year in a row, Water Country has been selected by the readers of Parenting New Hampshire as a “Family Favorite” award recipient for Family Favorite Water Park!
The Family Favorite awards is an award program that recognizes family-friendly businesses, services and places in almost 50 categories – as chosen by the readers of Parenting New Hampshire magazine.
“The Family Favorites’ award program recognizes those places, people and things that make New Hampshire a great place to raise a family,” said Melanie Hitchcock, editor of Parenting New Hampshire. “The Family Favorites contest gives [parents] the opportunity to share that information with a wider public.”
The Family Favorite Award voting took place online from June 1 through August 15, 2015. The results of the reader’s poll will appear in the November 2015 issue of Parenting New Hampshire.
Water Country, part of the Palace Entertainment family of parks, is New England's largest, cleanest, safest, and friendliest water park located in Portsmouth, NH and is gallons of fun for the whole family. With thrilling rides that get the heart pounding, to attractions perfect for the little ones, they’ve got fun covered, spanning over 26 acres! Go fast or just relax. It’s up to you. Water Country is open mid-June thru Labor Day. Season passes for the 2016 season may be purchased online by visiting http://www.watercountry.com .
Parenting New Hampshire (parentingnh.com) is a publication of McLean Communications of Manchester, a wholly-own subsidiary of Yankee Publishing Inc. McLean Communications also publishes New Hampshire Business Review, New Hampshire Magazine, NH Magazine’s Bride, and New Hampshire Home.
